name: Dr. Bruce Bauersfeld, DVM
title: Veterinarian
awards: Distinguished Alumni of the Year - Ohio State University
philosophy: Fear-free veterinary experience, personalized care for each pet
notes: Helps worried pet owners feel confident. Check out his YouTube channel.
approach: Educates pet parents, treats each pet as unique, partners with owners

name: Dr. Maya Thompson, DVM
title: Veterinarian
awards: Veterinary Excellence Award - University of Georgia
philosophy: Gentle care for aging pets, holistic wellness
notes: Known for her calming presence and senior pet care workshops.
approach: Focuses on comfort, mobility, and emotional well-being for older pets

name: Dr. Javier Morales, DVM
title: Veterinarian
awards: Innovator in Exotic Pet Medicine - UC Davis
notes: Hosts a podcast on rare pet conditions and treatment breakthroughs.
approach: Uses cutting-edge tools and builds trust with pet families
